Articles.Content:
So today i downloaded the patch again for the 14th time! and it did the full download and after about an hour of aplyying the patch is said Done!

So...........?????

It didnt add anything, it never added any files to my 0.16 to mkae it 0.17????? it said done!!!! that means i should be able to play it? it didnt do anything!!!!! Ive been trying for 4 days now!!!! and this patcher just wont give me 0.17!!! It said done like 3 times but it never gave me anything! SOMEONE PLZ HELP ME I WANT 0.17!!!!

Hi, Im not a computer wizzard but I was having the same issues as you with the patcher being extremely un helpful.

It worked for me to go to the store and re-download the entire game. I hope this works.

1 Million ThankUUUUU's!

How could i ever repay u!!!!
